com.bonitasoft.engine.api

Interface MonitoringAPI


  • public interface MonitoringAPI
    Author:
    Zhao Na, Elias Ricken de Medeiros, Matthieu Chaffotte

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long getNumberOfActiveTransactions()
      Get the number of all active transactions If no active transactions there, return 0
      long getNumberOfUsers()
      Get the number of users in the organization of the current tenant.

    • Method Detail

      • getNumberOfActiveTransactions

        long getNumberOfActiveTransactions()
                            throws MonitoringException
        Get the number of all active transactions If no active transactions there, return 0
        Returns:
        the total number of active transaction
        Throws:
        MonitoringException - occurs when an exception is thrown during monitoring
        InvalidSessionException - Generic exception thrown if API Session is invalid, e.g session has expired.

      • getNumberOfUsers

        long getNumberOfUsers()
               throws MonitoringException
        Get the number of users in the organization of the current tenant. If there are no users return 0
        Returns:
        The number of users
        Throws:
        MonitoringException - occurs when an exception is thrown during monitoring
        InvalidSessionException - Generic exception thrown if API Session is invalid, e.g session has expired.
